description:
Yuji`s three-man team, the Explosive Machine Guns, take the stage to perform after Tribe Cool Crew. Their lightning moves are so exhilarating that the audience can`t take their eyes off them. Haneru and Kanon were no exceptions, as they were utterly entranced by their steps.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Life in the Fast Lane! Explosive Machine Guns!
光速! 爆音マシンガンズ!!
